column4: Havn't those guys making Linux heard of something called exe files.. They are great, just double click and the program/game will get installed.. It's truly amazing.. Windows have had it for years!
My windows system didn't break, I got a little blue cute screen a little now and than but nothing a format c: couldn't handlle...
Atleast I didn't have to use cryptic bacl woodo magic to get my programs working
problem is you don't know woodoo magick to make installs :P
